data.title: Serving Our Neighbors in Need | MUST Ministries.
data.meta_description: MUST is a volunteer organization dedicated to helping homeless and struggling individuals and families with food, clothing, housing, employment, and other services. We have facilities in Cobb and Cherokee counties and programs in other Georgia counties.
